NHK MEDICAL PRIVATE LIMITED

MEDICAL EQUIPMENT SUPPLIERS

This Equipment Rental Agreement (“Agreement”) is effective as of the date of signature, and is made between NHK MEDICAL PRIVATE LIMITED (Company) and {{ doc.customer_name }} (“Renter”). Company and Renter are hereinafter collectively referred to as “Parties”.

Company rents to Renter and Renter rents from Company, subject to the terms and conditions of this Agreement: Medical Equipment described on receipt/invoice:

  1. TERM: This Agreement shall commence on the Effective Date and remain in full force and effect until Equipment is returned to Company.
  2. PAYMENT: Renter shall pay the following:
    • Rs. {{ doc.rounded_total }} /- For a Total of {{ doc.total_no_of_dates }} Days;
    • Charges for optional services or cleaning, if any;
    • Applicable taxes,
    • A charge of Rs. 1000/- per day Per Equipment for late return of the Equipment, Without Advance Payment For The Renewal Period;
    • If any damage happens to the equipment then the renter should pay the actual cost of the product.
  3. SECURITY DEPOSIT: Renter shall pay a deposit as demanded by the Company. Company may use the deposit to cover any amounts due under this agreement.
  4. LATE PAYMENT: The renter should pay the rental payment on the day of the rental end date shown on the invoice. If the renter fails to do so, every day of delay will incur a fine of Rs. 1000/- (One Thousand Rupees Only) along with the actual rent amount.
  5. LOCATION OF EQUIPMENT: During the term, {{ doc.permanent_address }} (Renter Address)
  6. CARE OF EQUIPMENT: Equipment can only be used in a careful and proper manner and shall not be used in any way that is inconsistent with the Company’s instruction or manual.
  7. REPAIR AND ALTERATIONS: Equipment shall not be serviced or repaired and parts and accessories shall not be replaced without Company’s prior consent.
  8. LOSS OR DAMAGES: Renter shall be responsible for any loss or damage to the equipment.
  9. CONDITION OF EQUIPMENT: The Renter should return the item properly and the Company should examine the equipment. After that inspection, the Company will decide whether the product is acceptable or if any damages occurred. If any damages occurred, the Company will not provide any security deposit.
  10. RETURN OF EQUIPMENT: Renter shall return the equipment on the date specified under this agreement.
  11. RENEWAL: If Renter Wants To Continue using the Equipment After The Original (First Invoice) Rental Period, Need To Call & WhatsApp on 8884880013 or 8884880024. Make the Payment for The Renewal Period on OR Before the end date of the original invoice period, failing to which Company Reserves the Right to Collect Back Equipment Without any Prior intimation. Company also reserves the right to collect pending rental amounts with a fine/penalty of Rs. 1000 per day per equipment.
  12. TERMINATION: This agreement shall terminate if the renter is not paying the rent for 5 days. Then it’s the right of the Company to terminate the agreement and request the renter to return the particular product. The Company reserves the right to terminate at any point in time without any prior intimation.

DETAILS OF THE RENT EQUIPMENT:

{% for item in doc.items %} {% endfor %}
Equipment Name Equipment Serial No. Customer Name Starts from Ends on Monthly rent
{{ item.item_name }} {{ item.item_code }} {{ doc.customer_name }} {{ frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.start_date, "dd MMM yyyy") }} {{ frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.end_date, "dd MMM yyyy") }} {{ item.line_total }}/-

I (Renter) accept all the terms and conditions written in this agreement and I am aware of those things contained in this agreement. If anything goes wrong which is a violation of this agreement then I pay all the charges/fees and penalties contained in paragraphs.

Please act according to this agreement otherwise we have the right to file a Criminal, Civil, or suit for recovery against you in the competent court of law and you shall be fully responsible for the same.

COMPANY NAME: NHK Medical Pvt Ltd

SIGNATURE OF THE SENIOR MANAGER:

DATE:





Please provide us your AADHAAR CARD and valid MOBILE NUMBER for better communication.

THANK YOU




Authorized Signature
